WRITING.TEXT: It means he is intelligent if a mirror makes sense to him

WRITING.TITLE: [WP] Someone logs into their Facebook, and starts looking at a friend's profile pictures. To their surprise, they find they can not only look back at older pictures, but somehow future ones as well...
WRITING.TEXT: A new terms and conditions pops up. Only this account has the ability, and if anyone finds out it's lost forever.

WRITING.TITLE: The Universe is so large, that there is a fair to good chance that there is an arrangement of atoms and molecules that compose anything you could possibly imagine.
WRITING.TEXT: In fact, there is a good possibility that the same arrangement of atoms that compose you also exists elsewhere in the universe.
That makes more sense, but the infograph leads you to believe that it's the planet's gravity. But I think you're right!
